name: X-masTime: The Festive Season
overview: It is a time of Chaos. It is a time of despair. It is X-MasTime! Featuring: Santa Claus as himself Game released at The Party 3 in Herning, 1993. 7 levels of Christmas platform fun. Then it repeats with more difficulty. Smash the bad toys with your bag and pick up the pressies. Grab clocks to get more time
